description: Dashboard to monitor the Feature Flag services

targets.expr: topk(5, sum by(code, account) (rate(ff_sdk_http_requests_total{namespace="${namespace:text}", job="ff-client-server", url=~"/api/1.0/client/env/:environmentUUID/feature-configs|/api/1.0/client/env/:environmentUUID/target-segments|/api/1.0/client/env/:environmentUUID/target-segments/:identifier|/api/1.0/client/env/:environmentUUID/feature-configs/:identifier", code=~"200|304"}[$__interval])))

panels.title: Top 5 Sever SDK Requests by account

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by(code, account) (rate(ff_sdk_http_requests_total{namespace="${namespace:text}", job="ff-client-server", url=~"/api/1.0/client/env/:environmentUUID/target/:target/evaluations|/api/1.0/client/env/:environmentUUID/target/:target/evaluations/:feature", code=~"200|304"}[$__interval])))

panels.title: Top 5 Client SDK Requests by account
Top 5 Metrics SDK Requests by account

list.label: Namespace
list.name: namespace
list.query: harness-nextgen : prod, harness-nextgen-free : free, harness-nextgen-compliance : comp

title: Feature Flags Services
